page.title: 10HOUSING 2 HOMELIFE - ENERGY
page.content: Kingscote lacks mains gas. Many residents regret this. Space Heating- 28 out of 32 houses(88%) have central heating. These are divided evenly between oil fired and solid fuel with a few woodburners. Central heating is often backed up with open log fires. Water Heating is mainly by central heating as above but Rayburn/Aga type cookers heat water in 4 houses. Most have electric immersion heaters for back up, though 5 houses(15%) are solely dependent on this. Cooking is dominantly electric(80%) with a few using bottled gas(15%). Oil or solid fuel cookers make up the rest. Microwaves are rare. Energy costs are one reason why older couples plan to move from larger houses when children have left home.
